articles.title: Foreign Ministry Vows to Bolster Nuclear Deterrent in New Way
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Vows to Bolster Nuclear Deterrent in New Way
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Monday as regards the recently disclosed U.S. scenario for a nuclear attack on the DPRK:
					 Recently declassified state documents of the U.S. revealed the fact that it planned a nuclear attack on the DPRK in 1969 when EC-121 large spy plane incident occurred.
					
					 At that time the U.S. Defense Department worked out a "plan for attacking 12 places of north Korea with 0.2-10kt nuclear weapons", a "plan for attacking 16 airfields with 10-70kt nukes to destroy air force of north Korea" and a "plan for disabling the majority of the offensive capability of north Korea" in "retaliation" against the resolute self-defensive measure taken by the DPRK and submitted them to the White House.
					
					 According to those documents, the U.S. had worked out a plan to mount nuclear attacks on the DPRK and several areas of Northeast China in 1954, the year right after the end of the Korean War.
					
					 This is another testimony that the U.S. has always watched for a chance to use nuclear weapons against the DPRK, pursuant to the "policy of strength" toward it.
					
					 This indicates that the present U.S. administration is nothing different from the preceding regimes in their policy of nuclear threat to the DPRK as it excluded the DPRK from the list of non-use of nuclear weapons in the "Nuclear Posture Review" in April.
					
					 Historical facts prove that the DPRK was quite right when it made a decision to react to nukes with a nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The recent disturbing development on the Korean Peninsula underscores the need for the DPRK to bolster its nuclear deterrent in a newly developed way to cope with the U.S. persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK and military threat toward it.

articles.title: KPA Accuses US of Introducing Heavy Weapons in Panmunjom
articles.content:
KPA Accuses US of Introducing Heavy Weapons in Panmunjom
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army sent a message of protest to the U.S. imperialist aggression forces side Monday slamming the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for introducing various types of heavy weapons to the portion of the south side in the area around the Panmunjom Conference Hall.
					 Fully armed U.S. imperialist aggression troops and the south Korean puppet army unhesitatingly committed this provocation in the eyes of the KPA, an indication that they are set to perpetrate a military provocation any moment, the message says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. forces side introduced those weapons at around 7:25 a.m. on June 26.
					
					 The introduction of heavy weapons to the area around the conference hall where armed forces of both sides stand in acute confrontation is a premeditated provocation aimed to spark off a serious military conflict.
					
					 The KPA side has followed with vigilance the moves of the U.S. forces side instigating the puppet forces to push the situation on the Korean Peninsula to such phase on the eve of the outbreak of a war and find an ignition point with June 25, the day of the start of the Korean War, as a momentum. 
					
					 The KPA side notifies the U.S. forces side of its following principled stand as regards the latter's serious military provocation:
					
					1. The U.S. forces side should immediately stop the provocative introduction of heavy weapons to the area around the Panmunjom Conference Hall. It should withdraw all those weapons already introduced from the area at once.
					
					2. In case it does not comply with the principled demand of the KPA side, it will take strong military countermeasures in the said area.
					
					The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces should never forget their bitter defeat six decades ago.

articles.title: Army-People Rallies Held in Provinces
articles.content:
Army-People Rallies Held in Provinces
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies against the United States were held on June 27 and 28 in North Phyongan, Ryanggang, South Phyongan, Jagang, North and South Hwanghae provinces on the occasion of "June 25, the day of struggle against the U.S. imperialists".
					 Present there were leading officials of local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, servicepersons, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 Speakers at the rallies condemned the U.S. imperialists for provoking a war of aggression to stifle the DPRK in its cradle 60 years ago and committing barbaric massacres by mobilizing huge armed forces and man-killing equipment.
					
					 They lashed out at the U.S. imperialist aggressors for imposing horrible disasters upon the Korean people, blocking the reunification of the country and inciting the confrontation between fellow countrymen and at the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, their followers.
					
					 They accused the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces of getting frantic in their moves to stifle the DPRK after announcing the absurd "results of the investigation" while groundlessly linking the DPRK with the case of the sunk warship. 
					
					 If the enemies opt for a reckless war despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, they will not be able to escape self-destruction, bitterly cursed and denounced by the mankind standing for global peace and stability, they warned.
					
					 The rallies were followed by anti-U.S. demonstrations.

articles.title: Jongilbong Prize Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Jongilbong Prize Sports Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The 36th national schoolchildren's sports contest for Jongilbong Prize was closed with due ceremony in Sariwon on Monday.
					 In the group of secondary schools boys of Sunam Secondary School in Sunam District, Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province, and girls of Pyongyang Janggyong Secondary School placed first in the football matches each, boys of Pyongyang Ryonghung Secondary School and girls of Pyongyang Tongdaewon Secondary School in the indoor football matches each, girls of Pyongyang Kwanmun Secondary School in the girls volleyball matches, boys and girls of Jaechon Secondary School in Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province, in the marathon races and boys of Pyongyang June 9 Ryongbuk Secondary School and girls of Pyongyang Kwangbokgori Secondary School in the table tennis matches.
					
					 In the group of primary schools boys of Kyongam Primary School of Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, and girls of Phohang Primary School of Riwon County, South Hamgyong Province came first in the football matches each and boys of Sangmae Primary School of Sariwon City and girls of Sinhung Primary School of Sariwon City in the indoor football matches.

articles.title: Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Staged in Huichon
articles.content:
Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain" Staged in Huichon
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The light comedy "Echo of Mountain", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, was staged in Huichon, Jagang Province, before full house.
					 It was appreciated by leading officials of party and power organs and working people's organizations, people from all walks of life and youth and students in the province. 
					
					  The performance encouraged the audience to turn out in a dynamic drive to bring about the "Echo of Mountain" in a thriving nation by carrying forward that in the era of Chollima. 
					
					 Meetings to follow the examples set by its principal characters also took place at units of various levels.

articles.title: Chinese Media Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Media Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television of China headed by Vice Minister Tian Jin arrived here Monday by air.

articles.title: Light Industry Factories Boost Production
articles.content:
Light Industry Factories Boost Production
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Light industry factories in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have overfulfilled their plan for the first half of the year.
					 The Pakchon Silk Mill has surpassed their target, 101, 107 and 130 percent in the production of blanket, cloth and ramie lining respectively, by controlling equipment under a scrupulous plan, properly carrying on technical management and bringing weaving, printing and other machines into full operation.   
					
					 The Pyongyang Daily Necessities Factory has increased the output of consumer goods by 20 percent by introducing a speed control device in expansive extruder.   
					
					 The Nampho Disabled Soldiers' Shoes Factory has massproduced new models of shoes for men and women.
					
					 The Huichon Silk Mill has topped its plan -- 100, 101.4 and 119.3 percent in silk, cotton and floss. 
					
					 The Songyo Knitted Goods Factory has introduced more than ten technological innovations and inventions in production through a mass technological innovation movement from the beginning of the year.
					
					 The Pyongyang Textile Mill has boosted the production of cotton yarn, cloth and towel by 46.4 percent, 34.8 percent and 121.7 percent respectively compared with the corresponding period of last year.
					
					 Some 30 workers of the factory have already fulfilled their yearly quotas and many others their plan for the first half of the year.

articles.title: Anti-US Song Popular in Korea
articles.content:
Anti-US Song Popular in Korea
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The song "Death to the U.S. Imperialist Aggressors", created in Juche 49 (1960), is still popular in Korea.
					 The song encourages the servicepersons and civilians to the struggle against the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime. 
					
					 It was played by the band in various events, including a Pyongyang army-people rally and revenge-vowing meetings of working people's organizations, held on June 25, the day of the struggle against the U.S. imperialists".
					
					 Reflected in the song is a strong will of the Korean people to always keep themselves ready for action and decisively frustrate the reckless war provocation moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean regime of traitors.
					
					It also contains the idea that the Korean army and people, led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, will surely emerge victorious in fight with the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: US Wholly to Blame for Posing Nuclear Threat
articles.content:
US Wholly to Blame for Posing Nuclear Threat
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that the U.S. planned to use A-bombs in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula even after the last Korean War, sparking off public furor. Kansas City Star put it that bosses of the State Department, the Defense Department, the Joint Chiefs of Staff Headquarters, CIA and the three services of the U.S.  forces worked out at their strategic meeting in 1954 an operational plan envisaging A-bomb attacks in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula.
					 In 1969, too, the U.S. drafted an emergency plan Freedom Drop simulating nuclear attacks on the DPRK and ensuing damage.
					
					 Commenting on this, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Monday observes:
					
					 The above-mentioned facts brought to light who really poses a nuclear threat to the Korean Peninsula. With no rhetoric can the U.S. cover up these facts as they were leaked from CIA.
					
					 To look back upon history, the U.S. has been an assailant who has threatened the Korean people with nukes and the DPRK its victim.
					
					 The DPRK has been exposed to the U.S. constant nuclear threat for several decades.
					
					 The U.S. threatened to use nukes against the Korean people during the war. It had begun illegally introducing nuclear weapons to south Korea since the latter half of the 1950s. Their number reached more than 1 000 in the mid-1970s, turning south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal and nuclear advance base in the Fat East.
					
					 The U.S. has conducted ceaseless nuclear war exercises against the DPRK.
					
					 It is, indeed, a chief criminal seriously threatening peace and security on the Korean Peninsula. This is a stark fact.
					
					 It is its invariable ambition to preempt a nuclear attack on the DPRK any moment and stifle it.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear deterrent has guaranteed its supreme interests and security and reduced the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula. 
					
					 If the U.S. truly stands for the solution to the nuclear issue on the peninsula, it should stop threatening the DPRK with nukes and pull back all its nuclear armed forces from south Korea and roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Remarks of S. Korean Unification Minister of Assailed
articles.content:
Remarks of S. Korean Unification Minister of Assailed
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet minister of Unification, when "interviewed" by a reporter of Euronews TV on June 25, again let loose a spate of lies that the warship "Cheonan"  was sunk by a "torpedo attack of the north." He cried out for an "apology" and "punishment of those responsible for the case".
					 The traitor also ballyhooed about the "German style of unification", hurting the dignity of the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 The remarks of Hyon In Thaek are a grave provocation to the DPRK and the most unpardonable and blatant challenge. 
					
					 The Korean people ardently love the socialist system of Juche centered on the popular masses and are dynamically pushing ahead with the general onward march to build a thriving nation with conviction of sure victory and optimism, firmly rallied around the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 Traitor Hyon In Thaek, much upset by the stirring reality of the DPRK which has greeted the era of prosperity unprecedented in the history of the Korean nation, is making desperate efforts to tarnish the image of the DPRK and realize the ambition for achieving "unification under liberal democracy" at any cost. 
					
					 His outbursts are the total negation of the dignified system in the DPRK and an open declaration of a war as they have once again revealed the true colors as diehard confrontation maniac steeped in bitterness towards the DPRK to the marrow of his bones.
					
					 There has been no such reckless human scum and traitor keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen as Hyon among the successive ministers of "Unification" of south Korea.
					
					 It is shame and tragedy of the Korean nation to have such guy as Hyon among its members. 
					
					 The reality requires the south Korean people to decisively eliminate the root cause of misfortune of the nation such as Hyon in order to mend the inter-Korean relations and avert the danger of a war.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Holding Aloft WPK's Slogan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Holding Aloft WPK's Slogan
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- "When the Party is determined, we can do anything!" This serves as an ever-victorious banner being held aloft by the army and people of the DPRK in the on-going advance for a great surge.
					  Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in an editorial in this regard:
					
					 This slogan is an expression of absolute support and trust of the army and people of the DPRK in the great Party and an eruption of the do-or-die mental power to remain true to the Party's cause by displaying patriotic devotion in admirable practice.
					
					 The ongoing drive for a great surge in which the efforts of the whole party and state are focused on improving the standard of people's living is a striking demonstration of the Party's unshakable will to bring happiness to the Korean people in all aspects as early as possible.
					
					 The Korean people's boundless loyalty and indomitable mental power for the Party's cause have brought legendary Chollima to this land and ushered in a great heyday in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 The strong mental power of the Korean people to materialize the Party's plan for building a great prosperous and powerful nation without fail is now being given fullest play.
					
					 All the people should regard their posts as the front and bloom the Party's plan and determination to the brilliant reality.
					
					 The editorial calls on all the people to do their utmost in intensifying the drive for a great surge so that they may proudly greet the October festival with the honor and pride of having performed shining feats at the posts of the revolution assigned to them by the Party.

articles.title: S. Korea to Stage Madcap War Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korea to Stage Madcap War Exercises
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The puppet Ministry of Administration and Security of south Korea is planning to exceptionally stage the intensified 2010 Ulji exercises under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case, according to "Voice of People", an Internet broadcasting service of south Korea, on June 25.
					 In the "guidelines for intensified 2010 Ulji exercises" the ministry set the period of exercises from August 16 to 19 and announced that in this period the city, county and district administrative organs across south Korea would intensify the "exercises for formation of wartime office regulations" and stage drills for "countering terrorism", "compiling wartime budget" and so on.
					
					 The ministry is also considering a plan that in the period all the government employees shall wear combat uniforms and, in particular, completely stop their administration service in hours of intensive drill.
					
					 According to this plan, all those involved in the exercises are to shift to shelters by motor or on foot and, at the same time, conduct in practice the "exercises of evacuating administration offices", a drill of decentralizing and transferring the main secret and administration documents to designated facilities, under simulated conditions of "contingency". The projected exercises are said to be unusual in the history of the Ulji exercises.
					
					 Much upset by the recent and continued appearance of evidence scientifically proving that the case of warship sinking was a conspiratorial farce, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is more desperately escalating the anti-DPRK war moves to attain its political aims at any cost.

articles.title: Survivors of "Cheonan" Give Lie to "Results of Investigation"
articles.content:
Survivors of "Cheonan" Give Lie to "Results of Investigation"
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Survivors of the warship "Cheonan" case testified to the fact that that they did not see any column of waters caused by an explosion at the time of the incident, according to south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News on June 25. 
					 This fact was made known by the testimony of survivors which was disclosed by a lawmaker from an opposition party of the "National Assembly ad hoc committee for probing the case of warship "Cheonan" for the first time. 
					
					 Survivors said in their testimony: "The ship listed to the starboard with a 'bang' but we did not see any column of waters." "While sleeping we did not hear any sound of a shock and explosion nor did see any column of waters." "We did not see flames and smoke except feeling smell of burning oil." 
					
					 In particular, a survivor who was on watch duty at a high position at that time, said while on duty he heard a "bang" from near the left side of the stern but did not see any column of waters.
					
					 Conveying these facts, the daily news noted: "None of the survivors said he saw a column of waters caused by a torpedo-explosion at the time of the incident."

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Observed at Abroad Missions
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Observed at Abroad Missions
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Photo exhibitions and film shows were arranged at the DPRK missions in Cuba, Libya and Equatorial Guinea on June 18 to commemorate the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Displayed there were photos showing the undying exploits of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Present at the events were representatives of political parties of different countries permanently stationed in Cuba, personages of the National Youth Organization of Libya, the deputy general secretary and other leadership members of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and personages of political and social circles and officials of the DPRK missions in those countries.
					
					 The participants looked round the photos on display before watching Korean films "Reply of Korea", "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Night of Pyongyang".

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting, a lecture, a round-table talk and film shows were held in the Czech Republic, Uganda, Germany and Ethiopia between June 17 and 19 to mark the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 10th anniversary of the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The executive secretary of the Central Committee of the Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association said at the meeting that Kim Jong Il put forward fair and aboveboard reunification proposals to carry out the behests of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification and provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 The acting executive secretary of the Ugandan National Women's Council in a lecture noted with high appreciation that through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung as the integrated Juche system of idea, theory and method and proclaimed the programme of modeling the whole of society on the Juche idea.
					
					 In the round-table talk held at the building of the Communist Party of Germany, speakers condemned the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group for having cooked up the case of "Cheonan" to extremely aggravate the situation of the Korean Peninsula and expressed the stand to fully support the Korean people in the just cause of defending the sovereignty of the country and the right to existence.
					
					Korean films including "The Tower of the Juche Idea," "Faith of Korea" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" were shown at the film shows.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Meetings of solidarity with the Korean people were held in Sweden, Italy and Myanmar on June 12 and 15 on the occasions of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					Present were personages of political parties and organizations and popular masses of those countries and the ambassadors and staff members of the DPRK embassies there were invited.
					
					Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, noted that the inter-Korean summit and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration were a fruition of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's bold decision based on patriotism and his tireless efforts.
					
					He charged that the recent "Cheonan" case was a politically motivated farce orchestrated by the south Korean conservative forces to escalate confrontation with the DPRK and render the situation of the Korean Peninsula extremely strained, stressing that the progressive people of Sweden are opposed to the anti-DPRK campaign of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet authorities.
					
					Roberto Gabriele, general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, expressed the will to intensify the activities for solidarity with the just cause of the DPRK which is reliably defending the national dignity and the world peace and security from every aggression and war move of the hostile forces.
					
					Aung Thein Lynn, mayor of Yangon in Myanmar, expressed belief that the Korean people would surely achieve the reunification of the country in the near future.
					
					A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting in Sweden.

articles.title: MINREX declara consolidar el disuasivo nuclear con nuevo metodo
articles.content:
MINREX declara consolidar el disuasivo nuclear con nuevo metodo
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ATCC) -- Con respecto a que se dieron a conocer nuevos datos sobre el plan de Estados Unidos de atacar a Corea con armas nucleares, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 28 a la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea la siguiente respuesta:
					A traves de los documentos nacionales de EE.UU. descifrados hace poco, fue revelado el hecho de que este pais planeaba el ataque nuclear contra nuestro pais en 1969 cuando estallo el incidente del derribado avion espia norteamericano de gran tamano "EC-121".
					
					En aquel entonces, el Departamento de Defensa estadounidense presento a la Casa Blanca las tres variantes de "represalia" frente a nuestra rotunda medida de autodefensa: 
					
					Primera, atacar con las armas nucleares con capacidad destructiva de 0.2-10kt 12 lugares norcoreanos.
					
					Segunda, atacar 16 aeropuertos con armas nucleares de 10-70kt para aniquilar las fuerzas aereas norcoreanas.
					
					Tercera, neutralizar la mayor parte de la capacidad ofensiva norcoreana.
					
					Segun los documentos recien descifrados, en el ano 1954, inmediatamente despues del fin de la guerra coreana, EE.UU. habia elaborado un plan para asestar el ataque nuclear sobre varios puntos de la RPDC y del Nordeste chino. 
					
					 Esto deviene otra prueba de que cada vez que se le presentaba la oportunidad, EE.UU. queria usar de verdad las armas nucleares persiguiendo historicamente la "politica de fuerzas" sobre la RPDC.
					
					 La actual administracion norteamericana, que al publicar en abril pasado el "informe de revision del estado nuclear", excluyo a la RPDC de la lista de no uso de armas nucleares, sigue siendo identica a sus antecesores ejecutivos.
					
					 La verdad de la historia confirma que es sumamente justa la decision de la RPDC de hacer frente a las armas nucleares con las mismas.
					
					 En particular, la anormal situacion, que se crea ahora en la Peninsula Coreana, destaca la necesidad de seguir fortaleciendo el disuasivo nuclear con el nuevo metodo avanzado para hacer frente a la persistente politica hostil y amenaza militar de EE.UU. contra la RPDC.

articles.title: Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom emite aviso a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom emite aviso a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ATCC) -- La Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom envio el dia 28 el aviso de protesta a la parte norteamericana con respecto a que los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos incurrieron en la grave provocacion militar de introducir en la zona sur de la sede de reuniones de Phanmunjom las armas pesadas de diversos tipos.
					Tal acto cinico, que se comete en la cara de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, muestra que las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y el ejercito titere surcoreano ya armados hasta los dientes intentan provocar un choque armado en cualquier momento, senala la notificacion y continua:
					
					A eso de las 7 y 25 del dia 26, la parte de tropas norteamericanas emplazo ilegalmente las armas pesadas de diversos tipos en la zona sur de la sede de reuniones de Phanmunjom.
					
					La introduccion de armas pesadas en esa area, donde se enfrentan agudamente las fuerzas armadas de ambas partes, es una provocacion premeditada encaminada al grave choque militar. 
					
					La parte de la RPDC observa con alta vigilancia a las tropas norteamericanas que buscan el motivo de la guerra instigando a los titeres surcoreanos a llevar a la coyuntura de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Frente a la grave provocacion militar de la parte de tropas norteamericanas, la representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom avisa la siguiente posicion de principios del EPC: 
					
					Primero, la parte de tropas norteamericanas debe parar inmediatamente la provocativa introduccion de armas pesadas en el area de la sede de reuniones de Phanmunjom. 
					
					Para este fin, tiene que sacar sin demora todas las armas pesadas ya emplazadas. 
					
					Segundo, en caso de que no sea escuchada esa demanda de principios, la parte del EPC tomara las duras contramedidas militares en el area de la sede de reuniones de Phanmunjom. 
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos no deben olvidarse nunca de su amarga derrota sufrida hace 60 anos.

articles.title: CRPP condena maniobras belicas anti-RPDC de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
CRPP condena maniobras belicas anti-RPDC de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ATCC) -- Desde el 9 al 22 del mes en curso los titeres surcoreanos desplegaron un ejercicio terrestre tirando las balas en las provincias de Kyonggi y de Kangwon del Sur de Corea, mientras que en el Mar Este de Corea la primera flota de la marina de guerra titere y la policia maritima realizaron en conjunto el ejercicio de lanzamiento de bombas de profundidad y de bombardeo naval movilizando mas de 10 buques de guerra incluidos los destructores y corbetas, y helicopteros. 
					 Al mismo tiempo, los titeres emplazaron en el Mar Oeste de Corea un colectivo de portaaviones nucleares norteamericanos con el fin de desarrollar los ejercicios maritimos conjuntos de caracter provocativo y tratan de librar los ejercicios de la "Iniciativa de No Proliferacion de Armas de Exterminio Masivo" cuyo objetivo es bloquear las areas maritimas de la RPDC y registrar los barcos de esta. 
					
					 El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP), en su informacion no.959, publicada el dia 27, califica tales maniobras belicas anti-RPDC tan imprudentes y aventureras de los belicistas titeres de la criminalidad antinacional nunca tolerable que acarrea la segunda guerra coreana a la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					  Ademas, devienen el desafio total a la nacion aspirante a la paz y la reunificacion, grave provocacion a la RPDC y abierta declaracion de la confrontacion militar, revela y continua:
					
					  La banda traidora titere, que se halla en el dilema sin salida y esta abandonada por la poblacion por sus actos traidores y proyanquis, y por su politica antipopular y de confrontacion fratricida, invento el incidente del hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan" bajo el control trasero de su amo norteamericano, y lo vinculo intencionalmente con la RPDC con el fin de pasar exitosamente las "elecciones de autonomia local" levantando la "oleada anti-Norte", pero sufrieron una gran derrota. Por eso, se entregan con mas frenesi a las maniobras de agresion a la RPDC hablando de la "represalia" y "contramedidas rotundas".
					
					  La realidad muestra que los compinches del traidor titere surcoreano son lacayos de los imperialistas norteamericanos y maniacos de guerra mas crueles.

articles.title: Amenaza nuclear proviene de EE.UU., afirma Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Amenaza nuclear proviene de EE.UU., afirma Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ATCC) -- Ahora se produce un escandalo al revelarse que aun despues de la pasada guerra coreana, Estados Unidos planeaba usar las bombas atomicas en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					 Segun el periodico estadounidense Kansas City Star, en una reunion estrategica de los cabecillas del Departamento de Estado, el Departamento de Defensa, la Junta de los Jefes de Estado Mayor, la Agencia Central de Inteligencia y las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas de EE.UU., sesionada en 1954, fue elaborado el plan operacional que preveia el ataque con bombas atomicas en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					 Tambien en 1969, EE.UU. habia trazado el plan emergente llamado "Freedom Drop" que previo el ataque nuclear contra la RPDC y hasta las perdidas consecuentes. 
					
					 De esta manera, quedo aclarado evidentemente de donde proviene la verdadera amenaza nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					 Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 28 y continua:
					
					 Por muy elocuente que fuera EE.UU., no podra refutar tales hechos cuya fuente es la misma CIA.
					
					 Durante varios decenios, la RPDC viene viviendo bajo la constante amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					 Ya durante la pasada guerra coreana, EE.UU. habia ejercido el chantaje nuclear al pueblo coreano.
					
					A partir de la segunda mitad de la decada de 1950, comenzo a introducir ilegalmente las armas nucleares en el suelo surcoreano, el numero de las cuales llego a mas de mil a mediados de la decada de 1970. 
					
					De esta manera, el suelo surcoreano se ha convertido en el arsenal nuclear y la base avanzada nuclear de maximo tamano de EE.UU. en el Extremo Oriente. 
					
					Por otra parte, el imperio no deja de librar los ejercicios de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Es un hecho innegable que el imperio es precisamente el amenazador nuclear que perturba gravemente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Es invariable la ambicion de EE.UU. de atropellar a la RPDC al atacarla preventivamente en cualquier momento.
					
					El disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC es la garantia de la defensa de los supremos intereses del pais y su seguridad porque reduce el peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Si EE.UU. desea de veras la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, debe dejar de amenazar a la RPDC con artefactos nucleares, sacar todas sus fuerzas nucleares del suelo surcoreano y cancelar su politica hostil a la segunda.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica visita de Lee Myung Bak al cementerio de ONU
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica visita de Lee Myung Bak al cementerio de ONU
Pyongyang, 28 de junio (ATCC) -- En estos dias, se desarrollan sucesivamente en el Sur de Corea los actos anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con motivo del 25 de junio de este ano, aniversario 60 del estallido de la pasada guerra coreana. 
					En el mismo contexto, hace poco, el traidor Lee Myung Bak visito el "cementerio de la ONU" por primera vez de un "presidente" surcoreano a los 44 anos.
					
					Al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo la vispera un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					Ni los antecesores de Lee Myung Bak se atrevieron a visitar ese lugar de la ONU para rendir homenaje a los mercenarios muertos en la guerra coreana.
					
					Sin embargo, Lee lo hizo sin ningun remordimiento partiendo de su afan de servir a las grandes potencias, venderles la patria y desencadenar la guerra de agresion a la RPDC al cabo de la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Aunque pase mucho tiempo, no se puede encubrir los enormes crimenes de los imperialistas norteamericanos, los mercenarios de sus satelites y los titeres surcoreanos ni aplacar el odio y el revanchismo de la nacion coreana que quiere vengarse a cualquier precio de esos asesinos salvajes. 
					
					Por esta razon, esa locura del traidor Lee Myung Bak significa insulto insoportable a los habitantes asesinados tragicamente por los agresores y desafio frontal a todos los coreanos que reclaman la venganza de sangre.
					
					Durante su visita a EE.UU. en abril pasado, el traidor Lee alabo el supuesto "sacrificio y abnegacion de los combatientes participantes en la guerra" y dijo que la agresion a Corea de EE.UU. sirvio de fuerza motriz de "desarrollo".
					
					Y recientemente, a traves de los principales medios de prensa de los paises participantes en la pasada guerra coreana en adhesion a EE.UU., expreso su "agradecimiento" y envio su "carta de agradecimiento" a los ex mercenarios. 
					
					Este hecho comprueba que no es casual la visita de Lee al "cementerio de la ONU" y que este traidor tiene la siniestra intencion de elogiar la guerra de agresion a la RPDC, desatada por los titeres surcoreanos a instigacion de EE.UU., y provocar la segunda guerra coreana. 
					
					En el caso de tolerarse los actos de los titeres surcoreanos orientados a fomentar el belicismo anti-RPDC aprovechando el 60o aniversario de la guerra coreana, la nacion coreana tanto del Norte como del Sur no podra evitar la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					Como reza el refran coreano "Cada cual responde por sus actos", sera enjuiciada severamente tarde o temprano la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak que esta obsesionada por la confrontacion con la connacional RPDC impidiendo la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
